lead_paragraph: Choreographed by Jon Kinzel, the work infuses set movement with strands of improvisation and is largely structured as a series of overlapping, episodic duets.
snippet: Choreographed by Jon Kinzel, the work infuses set movement with strands of improvisation and is largely structured as a series of overlapping, episodic duets.

headline.kicker: Dance Review | 'Responsible Ballet and What We Need Is a Bench to Put Books On'

headline.main: Meditations on What Happens When Two People Share a Space
headline.seo: At the Kitchen, Multiple Meditations on the Duet
